Tool

NameSelect by String Expression
ID19
AuthorO.Conrad (c) 2013

Description

Searches for an character string expression in the attributes table and selects records where the expression is found.

Parameters

NameTypeIdentifierDescriptionConstraints
Input
Table Table (input)TABLE
Options
AttributeTable fieldFIELDattribute to be searched; if not set all attributes will be searched
ExpressionTextEXPRESSION
Case SensitiveBooleanCASEDefault: 1
Select if...ChoiceCOMPAREAvailable Choices: [0] attribute is identical with search expression [1] attribute contains search expression [2] attribute is contained in search expression Default: 1
MethodChoiceMETHODAvailable Choices: [0] new selection [1] add to current selection [2] select from current selection [3] remove from current selection Default: 0
